aboutMeP2: Born and raised in Stockholm, Sweden by polar opposite parents. One being heavily into the arts, culture and creation, while the other was more business and tech focused. I walked away with an interest for both.
aboutMeP3: My name is Aston Andersson Dahllof, I am a Full-Stack Web Developer & creative living in Saint John, New Brunswick Canada. I spend my days learning and creating things that make me happy. My goal is to one day be able to give back to the city that took me in.
